price: Indeed, We have sent to you a Messenger to be a witness over you, just as We sent to Pharaoh a messenger.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ رَسُولٗا شَٰهِدًا عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ رَسُولٗا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
